name: An aqueous solution of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide
acetic acid
with oxalic acid (CAS Reg. No. 144-62-7) and/or maleic acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous solution of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), with oxalic acid (CAS Reg. No. 144-62-7) and/or maleic acid (CAS Reg. No. 110-16-7).
